sentences.sContent: When she put the car in gear it began to buck wildly.
sentences.sCn: 当她把汽车搭上齿轮时，汽车便开始颠簸地行进。

sentences.sContent: This large gear turns the small one to rotate the cylinder.
sentences.sCn: 这个大齿轮带动小齿轮使滚筒旋转。

sentences.sContent: The typical career pattern was geared to men whose wives didn’t work.
sentences.sCn: 这种典型的职业模式是为妻子不工作的男性设计的。

sentences.sContent: ...but the thrill of young love seems to have shifted a gear in his mind: from now on...
...you can shift the gear of it to change the speed anytime you like accordingly...
